column4: For some reason or another my scroll wheel stopped functioning, but the ZAxisMapping is set up properly (as far as I can tell), is there something else I need to make sure is set up right?
there should be a line Option         "Protocol" "ExplorerPS/2" or Option         "Protocol" "ImPS/2"
I see the ImPS/2 one
has it stopped in all applications?
so far, firefox, gaim, gedit
any other ideas (scrolll wheel thing)?
has it just failed in this session, or have you rebooted since?
rebooted twice
anything suspicios in /var/log/Xorg.0.log ? Look for lines that start with EE
only stuff about my wacom tablet (which hasn't been attached for nearly 6 months)
have you tested the mouse wheel on another machine?
so what has changed since yesterday?
is it a USB mouse?
any chance you can plug it into a USB port?
no difference
also, run a 'tail -f /var/log/syslog' and watch while you unplug and replug. Any errors logged?
no difference
logs?
again only wacom errors
run a 'tail -f /var/log/syslog' and watch while you unplug and replug. Any errors logged?
nothing looks out of place in syslog
I suspect a hardware fault then. Some dirt blocking the optical sensor. Borrow another mouse to test, or test yours elsewhere.
